translation: The Blessed Lord said, "In My opinion, those who fix their minds on Me, worship Me ever steadfastly, and are endowed with supreme faith, are the best in Yoga."
commentary: 12.2 Mayi on Me? Obligatory fixing? The mind the mind? These who? Mam Me? ever steadfast? worship worship? Shraddhaya with faith? Paraya supreme? Upetah endowed? And those? Me of Me? yuktatamah the best versed in Yoga? Matah (in My) opinion.Commentary Those devotees who fix their minds on Me in the Cosmi Form? the Supreme Lord and worship Me? ever harmonized and with intense and supreme faith? regarding
